item.title: Judge Rules PROJECT VERITAS Is 'Political Spying'...
item.description:
www.msn.com
A federal judge has dealt conservative figure James O’Keefe a legal blow, ruling that his group’s undercover operations against a Democratic consulting firm can fairly be described at an upcoming million-dollar trial as “political spying.” Making matters worse for the right-wing star, the judge cited O’Keefe’s own book as evidence against him.
